title: Opulence Squadra Watch Face
summary: All new and animated with skins and setting display for round and square!!!
developerAddress: 2036 avenue  de la salle, Montreal, Quebec, Canada, H1V 2K5
description: 5 function screens touch 3 o'clock to cycle plus dimmed mode and a setting screen touch 9 o'clock to access :- 5 texture skins - 5 text color - time format, temp format and measurements - Designed for Round and Square watchesAnimated transitions.---main display--Analog timedigital time3 time zonedual time zoneday, month, datewatch powerphone power--chronometer--lapflybacksmooth secondsmilliseconds--weather--conditionstemperaturelow and highhumidity levelwind directionand speed--calendar--current date3 eventscolor codedevents namestart and finish time--activity--pulsestepsdistanceburned calories--dimmed mode--locationdigital timeday, month, dateconditionstemperaturewatch powerphone powerMade for android wear 5- Watchmaker needed to load the watch face Download here : http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
descriptionHTML:
5 function screens touch 3 o'clock to cycle plus dimmed mode and a setting screen touch 9 o'clock to access :
- 5 texture skins - 5 text color - time format, temp format and measurements -

Designed for Round and Square watches

Animated transitions.

---main display--
Analog time
digital time
3 time zone
dual time zone
day, month, date
watch power
phone power

--chronometer--
lap
flyback
smooth seconds
milliseconds

--weather--
conditions
temperature
low and high
humidity level
wind direction
and speed

--calendar--
current date
3 events
color coded
events name
start and finish time

--activity--
pulse
steps
distance
burned calories

--dimmed mode--
location
digital time
day, month, date
conditions
temperature
watch power
phone power

Made for android wear 5
- Watchmaker needed to load the watch face Download here : http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
comments: No use Not working on SW3 and affected other faces I'd downloaded. Had to uninstall as unable to see it!
What I've been looking for. I love the functionality, but I'd like to be able to change the face plate. Moto 360.
Looks awesome but Is this compatible with the Asus Zenwatch 2? I can't get it to show up in my menu.
Can't see it Can't see on my hauwai watch new

Best face After both trying to create my own and searching available faces this is the most useful face by far.  With the touch actions it really maximizes the usefulness of my Moto 360.  Design and options are great. Just wish I could use the carbon or metal face with regular numbers not Roman numerals. Hope that will be coming in a future update.
Temp unit needs to be changeable I love the watch. My WatchMaker app is set to F°, but watch is only in C°. Fix this and I will give 5 stars.
recentChanges: New code to make it smoother and stable
Now 6 modes added live compass map with zoom and bearing
Localized day fixed for german language
New changeable dial numbers touch between 9 and 12
